block.title: Intermapper App Setup
block.text:
Before configuring the App here please ensure that you have read the install guide and have correctly configured the Intermapper server.
If you don't currently run Intermapper then you can download a free 30 day trial from here.

Please complete the following fields fully to finish configuration.
Once saved it can take a few minutes for the App to fully download and setup all dashboards for first use.

input.label: Port: (Leave blank for default port 80/443 by connection type)

block.title: App Options

input.label: Map Refresh Interval In Seconds (Leave blank for default 20 seconds)

block.text: Note: The Splunk App can retrieve switch information if you add a Splunk/Layer 2 Output probe to a map in InterMapper.
